ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Dick Beck,Pete Costanza,Ogden Whitney,Dick Beck,Pete Costanza
ComicInfo.Title: The Buried Life of Joe Ferrari!; Beware of My Hands!; That's the Way the Ball Bounces!; The Body in the Well!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Buried Life of Joe Ferrari!: In the future, dull witted Joe Ferrari accidentally takes a rocket to a world full of aliens planning an invasion of Earth. After drinking some of their truth serum, he gains super-human strength and defeats them.
Beware of My Hands!: An Egyptian tomb robber disturbs an ancient evil pharaoh's tomb.
That's the Way the Ball Bounces!: A neurotic wizard creates a magic rubber ball that goes around town helping people with their problems.
The Body in the Well!: A group of children fall into an ancient well and are saved by the ghost of a boy who died in the well over a century earlier.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
